description: Oil prices slipped in early Asian trade on Thursday, after hitting a nearly three-month low during the previous session, as fears of a potential global recession spurred concerns about oil demand.
title: Oil prices extend drop as recession fears cloud global demand outlook - Reuters.com

description: World oil demand will rise more than 2% to a record high of 101.6 million barrels per day (bpd) in 2023, the International Energy Agency said on Wednesday, although sky-high oil prices and weakening economic forecasts dimmed the future outlook.
title: Global oil demand set to rise 2% to new high in 2023, says IEA - Reuters.com
